items.question: What types of images can I enhance with this feature?
items.answer: You can enhance any portrait or product photograph. Our technology works best with images that have clear eye details and good lighting. Upload high-resolution photos for optimal results.

items.question: How long does the enhancement process take?
items.answer: The enhancement process is incredibly fast, typically completed in seconds. Depending on your selected enhancement level, results are generated almost instantaneously.

items.question: Can I control how much the eyes are enhanced?
items.answer: Yes! You can choose from subtle, moderate, or dramatic enhancement levels to match your creative needs and desired outcome.

items.question: Will the enhancements look natural?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our AI is designed to provide realistic enhancements that maintain the authenticity of the original image while improving the eye details.

items.question: Is there any software or technical skills required?
items.answer: No technical skills or software are needed. Simply upload your image, select your enhancement level, and the AI handles the rest.

items.question: Can I use the enhanced images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! All enhanced images come with full commercial rights, allowing you to use them for marketing, advertisements, and any other commercial needs.

items.question: What kind of support is available if I have issues?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support options including documentation, tutorials, and responsive customer service for any technical questions.

items.question: Are there hidden fees in the pricing model?
items.answer: No hidden fees! We operate on a clear pay-as-you-go model with transparent pricing, so you only pay for the enhancements you need.

items.question: Can I enhance multiple images at once?
items.answer: Yes! You can batch upload images for simultaneous enhancements, saving you time and effort while ensuring consistent quality.

items.question: What are the best use cases for eye enhancement technology?
items.answer: This technology is perfect for professional photography, e-commerce, social media, and any scenario that requires attention-grabbing eye detail.
